text:
Parsley Health | New York, NY | Full-time | On-site

Come help us [reimagine healthcare][1]! We're a [Series A][2] funded company, seeing patients and building tech to make medicine better, smarter and friendlier.

We have a number of open product roles: Senior Frontend Engineer, Senior Backend Engineer, Frontend Engineer, Backend Engineer, Product Manager, Product Designer, Data Analyst.

https://www.parsleyhealth.com/careers/

Keywords: React/Redux, Google Cloud, Node.js, BigQuery, Golang, GraphQL, gRPC, HIPAA

[1]: https://www.fastcompany.com/90224888/is-this-150-a-month-hol...

[2]: https://techcrunch.com/2018/04/17/parsley-health-picks-up-10...
